motd.title: Message of the Day
motd.body:
Do you experience one or more of the following issues?
* in-game chat not working and/or gradually getting worse * disconnects from the server * slate crash during transition into match (infinite loading) * client locking mid match, yet the audio still persists as if the match is still being played * not being given the option to rejoin matches * spawning under the map
The development team asked to provide your region, internet speed and the files this tool collects to customer support as they are having a team working on those issues RIGHT now!
